thread.title: Justin Bieber is threatening to sue media publishing THOSE nude pictures - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber is threatening to sue media publishing THOSE nude pictures - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Justin Bieber is threatening to sue media publishing THOSE nude pictures - Showbiz
text: Justin Bieber is threatening to sue any media outlet publishing nude pictures that he claims were taken illegally.The New York Daily News published censored, long-lens paparazzi photographs of a nude Bieber on Wednesday (October 7), after the 21-year-old was spotted enjoying his private pool alongside British model girlfriend Jayde Pierce. Â© Getty Images / Steve Granitz/WireImage The offending images were apparently snapped while Bieber was standing outside of his hotel room in the South Pacific islands.His high-powered attorneys have since sent a legal order to The New York Daily New demanding the newspaper cease and desist, according to The Hollywood Reporter.While the legal order requests that Daily News take down the snaps from its website, the photos still remain in tact as of tonight (October 9).In their letter to the Daily News, Bieber's lawyers insist that the publication of such images violates the singer-songwriter's privacy and trademarks.Bieber has yet to comment publicly on the release of these naked pictures.In happier news, Bieber was shirtless on Twitter today for the unveiling of the cover of his forthcoming studio album Purpose.
